args.natural_language_statement: Let X and Y be topological spaces and A subset of X be dense. Prove that the inclusion of C(Y) -> C(X \times Y) is an isomorphism onto the functions which are constant on each set {x} \times Y with x in X. Save it to: benmckay_top_topology_262.lean
